MR No. 606 - Purpose of Sanitariums

     The Sanitarium is to be the Lord's instrumentality for sowing the seeds of truth in human hearts and removing the unjust stigma which has been placed upon Seventh-day Adventists.--Letter 42, 1900, p. 8. (To S. N. Haskell, March, 1900.) 

Released March 17, 1978.
